title: Ep - 140 - CAPTAIN LEE FROM BELOW DECK
description:
Captain Lee from Below Deck talks about his life before reality television, the moment Ashton fell off the ship this season, Caroline’s departure, and whether we will ever see his son as the chef on a charter. 


Perta, a retired school teacher and gardener is forced to watch an old episode of MTV’s Jackass. 


Suzi, a retired Marine lawyer turned stay at home mom, reviews WETV’s Love After Lockup and The American Meme on Netflix.


Reality Life with Kate Casey
